column4: Do you guys know where I can get a live CD? I tried the ubuntu website, but the ship-it website is down.
Do you guys know where I can get a live CD? I tried the ubuntu website, but the ship-it website is down.
you can download the ISO & burn your own - it's a ~600Mb download
go to the download page, get the "desktop" ISO file, burn it, that'll get you the LiveCD w/ install option
the ISOs you download are completely identical to the pressed CDs from ShipIt
there should be an "Install Ubuntu" link on your desktop, if you're running the LiveCD
no problem - only suggestion I've got is to ease off on the Enter key a bit - one line per thought is good :)
https://help.ubuntu.com/community/BurningIsoHowto - i think I gave you this URL already, though?
language, thanks - and it looks like you got a bad download..
your download must have been stopped somehow
takes 6-8 weeks, maybe a bit less if you're lucky
try downloading it again - the Ubuntu servers are fairly fast
there are options for partitioning during the install, but the LiveCD won't touch your harddrives at first
start your machine w/ the CD in your drive
you'll need to tweak your BIOS to allow booting from CDROM before HDD
